Generation V.Black: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.
Generation V.White: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
Generation V.Black 2: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
Generation V.White 2: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

Generation VI.X: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
Generation VI.Y: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its five horns. The max temperature of the flames can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It protects itself with flame. Long years ago, people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.

Generation VIII.Sword: The people of ancient times believed that Larvesta fell from the sun.
Generation VIII.Shield: Larvesta's body is warm all over. It spouts fire from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators and scare prey.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon was called the Larva That Stole the Sun. The fire Larvesta spouts from its horns can cut right through a sheet of iron.
Generation IX.Violet: In ancient times, Larvesta was worshiped as the emissary of the sun. However, it was also viewed as a burden since it often caused forest fires.

Generation V.Black: Hatch Egg received from a Pokémon Ranger inside a building on Route 18
Generation V.White: Hatch Egg received from a Pokémon Ranger inside a building on Route 18

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Mirage Forest (north of Route 111 ), Mirage Island (north of Route 113 )
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Mirage Forest (north of Route 111 ), Mirage Island (north of Route 113 )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Loop Lagoon , Forest of Focus ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor , Challenge Beach , Loop Lagoon , Potbottom Desert ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
